name: Tokimeki Memorial Selection Fujisaki Shiori
overview: Tokimeki Memorial Selection Series (Shiori Fujisaki). Exclusive Storyline from Tokimeki Memorial ~Forever with You~. Based on individual character story with Idol-like Shiori Fujisaki Selection Story on Personal Music Clips, Special Dating-Love Stories, Mini-Games, Voice Selection, Portrait of different looks & make-ups etc.
